message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll be pleased with the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,800,000.
Alice,  $1,800,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm very interested in this product, but I can't go above $1,400,000 at this time.

I understand that $1,400,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $1,600,000. This is the best I can do, but I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $1,500,000, which is my absolute maximum. If we can agree on that price, I'll purchase the product immediately.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1,600,000. I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $1,580,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
